comments.en:
Apollo is a brand of HP, the printers use HP cartridges and papers, the main difference is the special design of the printers.

Same as the Apollo P-2500, but comes with both a colour and a black cartridge.

There is a P-2600U with USB and a P-2600P with parallel connection.

To get its maximum quality, use the HPIJS ("hpijs-pcl3") driver. 600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

The printer is equipped with a small photo frame in its lid.

Same as the Apollo P-2600, but with additional Windows software toys.
